1 - Multiple relaion clauses
assign a1; stmt s2;
Select a1 such that Follows (a1, s2) and Modifies (s2, "a") such that Uses (s2, "a")
13,7,9
5000
2 - Multiple relation clauses
assign a1, a2; stmt s1, s2; variable v1, v2; if ifs; while w;
Select <a1, a2> such that Parent* (s1, a1) and Modifies (a1, "a") and Modifies (a2, "x") and Parent* (s1, a2) with s1.stmt# = 11
18 12, 19 12, 23 12, 18 22, 19 22, 23 22
5000
3 - Multiple relation clauses
assign a1, a2; stmt s1, s2; variable v1, v2; if ifs; while w;
Select <a1, a2> such that Parent* (s1, a1) and Uses (a1, "a") and Uses (a2, "x") and Parent* (s1, a2) with s1.stmt# = 11
12 12,12 20,12 22,18 12,18 20,18 22,20 12,20 20,20 22,23 12,23 20,23 22
5000
4 - Repeat same relations
stmt s1; assign a2;
Select s1 such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) and Follows* (s1, a2) and Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) and Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) and Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) such that Follows* (s1, a2) 
10,12,26,28,30,31,33,36,38,6,7,8,9
5000
5 - Optimiazation test
assign a1, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, a7, a8, a9, a10, a11, a12, a13, a14, a15; stmt s; 
Select s such that Follows* (s, a1) such that Follows* (s, a2) such that Follows* (s, a3) and Follows* (s, a4)
10,12,26,28,30,31,33,36,38,6,7,8,9
30000
6 - Optimiazation test
assign a1, a2, a3, a4, a5, a6, a7, a8, a9, a10, a11, a12, a13, a14, a15; stmt s;
Select s such that Follows* (s, a1) such that Follows* (s, a2) such that Follows* (s, a3) and Follows* (s, a4) with a1.stmt#=a2.stmt# with a2.stmt#=a3.stmt# with a3.stmt#=a4.stmt#
10,12,26,28,30,31,33,36,38,6,7,8,9
5000
7 - Stress test 1
stmt s1; assign a1, a2; procedure p, q; variable v; read r;
Select <a1, v, a2, r.varName> such that Parent* (s1, a1) and Uses (a1, "a") and Modifies (a2, "x") and Calls (p, q) and Modifies (p, v) pattern a1 (v, _) such that Next* (s1, a1) and Affects (a1, a2)
12 x 12 a,12 x 12 b,12 x 12 c,12 x 12 x,12 x 22 a,12 x 22 b,12 x 22 c,12 x 22 x,18 a 12 a,18 a 12 b,18 a 12 c,18 a 12 x,23 a 12 a,23 a 12 b,23 a 12 c,23 a 12 x,33 x 33 a,33 x 33 b,33 x 33 c,33 x 33 x,36 c 38 a,36 c 38 b,36 c 38 c,36 c 38 x
5000
8 - Stress test 2
stmt s1, s2, s3; assign a1, a2; procedure p, q; variable v, v1;
Select <a1, q.procName, s3> such that Parent* (s1, a1) and Uses (a1, "a") and Modifies (a2, v) and Calls (p, q) and Modifies (p, v1) pattern a1 (v, _) such that Next* (s1, a1) and Affects (a1, a2) and Follows* (s2, s3)
12 P 10,12 P 13,12 P 14,12 P 2,12 P 27,12 P 28,12 P 29,12 P 3,12 P 31,12 P 34,12 P 37,12 P 38,12 P 39,12 P 4,12 P 40,12 P 5,12 P 7,12 P 8,12 P 9,12 Q 10,12 Q 13,12 Q 14,12 Q 2,12 Q 27,12 Q 28,12 Q 29,12 Q 3,12 Q 31,12 Q 34,12 Q 37,12 Q 38,12 Q 39,12 Q 4,12 Q 40,12 Q 5,12 Q 7,12 Q 8,12 Q 9,18 P 10,18 P 13,18 P 14,18 P 2,18 P 27,18 P 28,18 P 29,18 P 3,18 P 31,18 P 34,18 P 37,18 P 38,18 P 39,18 P 4,18 P 40,18 P 5,18 P 7,18 P 8,18 P 9,18 Q 10,18 Q 13,18 Q 14,18 Q 2,18 Q 27,18 Q 28,18 Q 29,18 Q 3,18 Q 31,18 Q 34,18 Q 37,18 Q 38,18 Q 39,18 Q 4,18 Q 40,18 Q 5,18 Q 7,18 Q 8,18 Q 9,23 P 10,23 P 13,23 P 14,23 P 2,23 P 27,23 P 28,23 P 29,23 P 3,23 P 31,23 P 34,23 P 37,23 P 38,23 P 39,23 P 4,23 P 40,23 P 5,23 P 7,23 P 8,23 P 9,23 Q 10,23 Q 13,23 Q 14,23 Q 2,23 Q 27,23 Q 28,23 Q 29,23 Q 3,23 Q 31,23 Q 34,23 Q 37,23 Q 38,23 Q 39,23 Q 4,23 Q 40,23 Q 5,23 Q 7,23 Q 8,23 Q 9,33 P 10,33 P 13,33 P 14,33 P 2,33 P 27,33 P 28,33 P 29,33 P 3,33 P 31,33 P 34,33 P 37,33 P 38,33 P 39,33 P 4,33 P 40,33 P 5,33 P 7,33 P 8,33 P 9,33 Q 10,33 Q 13,33 Q 14,33 Q 2,33 Q 27,33 Q 28,33 Q 29,33 Q 3,33 Q 31,33 Q 34,33 Q 37,33 Q 38,33 Q 39,33 Q 4,33 Q 40,33 Q 5,33 Q 7,33 Q 8,33 Q 9
5000
9 - Stress test 3
stmt s1, s2, s3; assign a1, a2; procedure p, q; variable v, v1;
Select <a1, p, v> such that Parent* (s1, a1) and Uses (a1, v) and Modifies (a2, v1) and Calls* (p, q) and Modifies (p, v) pattern a1 (_, _) such that Next* (s2, s3) and Affects* (a1, a2)
12 P a,12 P x,12 main a,12 main x,18 P a,18 main a,19 P b,19 main b,20 P a,20 P x,20 main a,20 main x,22 P x,22 main x,23 P a,23 main a,26 P a,26 P b,26 main a,26 main b,27 P b,27 P c,27 main b,27 main c,33 P a,33 P x,33 main a,33 main x,36 P a,36 P b,36 main a,36 main b,37 P b,37 P c,37 main b,37 main c
5000
10 - Stress test 4
stmt s1, s2, s3, s4;
Select <s1, s4> such that Next* (s1, s2) and Next* (s2, s3) and Affects (_,_) and Affects* (s1, s2) and Affects* (s3, s4) and Affects* (s1, s4) and Affects* (s4, s3)

11 - Stress test 5
stmt s1, s2, s3, s4, s5;
Select <s3, s1, s5> such that Next* (s1, s2) and Next* (s2, s3) and Affects (_,_) and Affects* (s2, s4) and Affects* (s3, s4) and Affects (s1, s2) and Affects* (s4, s5)

12 - Stress test 6
stmt s1, s2, s3, s4;
Select <s3, s1> such that Next* (s1, s2) and Next* (s2, s3) and Next* (_,_) and Next* (s2, s4) and Next* (s3, s4) and Next (s1, s2) and Next* (s1, s3)

13 - Stress test 7
stmt s1, s2, s3, s4, s5;
Select <s3, s1, s5> such that Affects* (s1, s2) and Affects* (s2, s3) and Affects* (_,_) and Affects* (s2, s4) and Affects* (s3, s4) and Affects (s1, s2) and Affects* (s4, s5)
